SELECT f.id, f.TRAN_TIME, dic.label TRAN_TYPE, f.TRAN_REASON, f.OUT_UNIT_NAME, f.COME_UNIT_NAME, CONCAT(f.MODIFIED_NAME,'(',f.MODIFIED_CODE,')') MODIFIED_NAME, f.MODIFIED_TIME, f.FIELD1, f.FIELD2, f.FIELD3, f.FIELD4, f.FIELD5 FROM mp_stafftransaction f left join sys_dict_item dic on f.TRAN_TYPE=dic.value and dic.type='YDLX' where 1=1 and f.DEL_FLAG=0
and f.STAFF_ID = #{staffid}
